plot: Mocumentary television has a new face on the beat. The under-funded precinct of Van Nuys is led by Peter "Ponch" Rodriguez, a disgraced cop with a track record of sexual harassment and gambling.
title: Bike Cops Van Nuys
plot_es: Mocumentary television has a new face on the beat. The under-funded precinct of Van Nuys is led by Peter "Ponch" Rodriguez, a disgraced cop with a track record of sexual harassment and gambling.
plot_en: Mocumentary television has a new face on the beat. The under-funded precinct of Van Nuys is led by Peter "Ponch" Rodriguez, a disgraced cop with a track record of sexual harassment and gambling.
